ModMetaData.name: No Siege Raids
ModMetaData.author: Laureeeeeeeeeeeeeeen
ModMetaData.description:
Disables siege-type raids as well as auto mortars within mech clusters. The raids still happen but a different strategy is chosen.
If you encounter a raid which you think should have been blocked please let me know by creating a new topic in the discussion tab for this mod.
Load after any mod which adds new incidents/raids. Not actually tested on 1.4, good luck!
